title: The Reluctant dragon (K)
creator_credit: Walt Disney Educational Media Company and Hamilton Luske
brief_description: A Walt Disney animated cartoon based on the story by Kenneth Grahame. Tells of a dragon and a knight who prefer to write poetry and drink tea than to fight. However, for the sake of tradition and to please the villagers, a somewhat unorthodox duel is staged.
